amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to establishing a biennial budget and appropriations process.

vote.text: Amendment SA 138 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 65.

action.text: Amendment SA 138 proposed by Senator Isakson.
